alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:06PM CDT until July 01 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Dent County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Northeastern Texas County in south central Missouri... Southern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 206 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Fort Leonard Wood to near Licking to 8 miles east of Raymondville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Fort Leonard Wood, Montauk State Park, Salem, Licking, Edgar Springs, Lenox, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Beulah, Howes Mill, Darien, Hazelton, Lake Spring, Gladden, Anutt, Bangert, Boss, Howes and Lecoma. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
